alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 04 at 7:57PM AKST until March 07 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected with snow, blowing snow, and strong winds. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. Total snow accumulations of one inch expected. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From late Saturday night through Sunday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 55 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
